# Final Project 

```{r, warning = F, message = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

diabetes_dataset <- read_csv("diabetes_012_health_indicators_BRFSS2015.csv")
head(diabetes_dataset)
```

## EDA

### Alice's EDA 

```{r}
diabetes_dataset %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(Diabetes_012), y = BMI, fill = factor(Diabetes_012))) +
    geom_boxplot() +
    scale_fill_manual(
      values = c("0" = "lightblue", "1" = "gold", "2" = "salmon"),
      labels = c("0" = "None", "1" = "Prediabetes", "2" = "Diabetes")
    ) +
    labs(
      x = "Diagnosis",
      y = "BMI",
      fill = "Condition",
      title = "BMI Distribution by Diagnosis"
    )
```
